comment: If you listen to his lectures he will give you everything you need to pass.
Gives you everything you will need. Only negative is that he talks way too much.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Clear grading criteria

comment: NICE GUY, VERY KNOWLEDGEABLE ON THE MATERIAL. WILL TALK YOUR EAR OFF, BUT I STILL REALLY LIKED HIM. ALLOWS FOR TEST CORRECTIONS. UPLOADS PREVIOUS EXAMS FOR SAMPLE QUESTIONS,MAKE SURE TO STILL STUDY THOUGH. ALLOWS CHEAT SHEET FOR EVERY TEST, CAN WRITE NOTES/FORMULAS JUST NO SOLVED PROBLEMS. WOULD TAKE HIM AGAIN.

This guy can talk! You'll forget your question by time he calls on you. So make sure to recorded it because this guy is almost impossible to meet outside class. Rarely answers emails or phone calls, many times he will not be in his office during his office hours. HOWEVER, if you listen to his lectures he will give you everything you need to pass.

Took him for 3500 and 4510. He is great! Love him! A little long-winded and will waste a class if he gets off on a story, but he explains everything so well you shouldn't worry. The material is not easy, but he is willing to help until you understand. The tests are not a walk in, laugh it off test. STUDY! You'll be ok. I studied. I got an A in both

Unable to get help in office, online, or by phone. So make sure you ask questions when your in person. Very knowledgeable yet talkative especially when tests get harder, and you just want to understand what to do. Cant track progress because he grades assignments extremely late.  Sample exams provided, but actual exams tend to be a toss up. STUDY!!

Very extremely intelligent professor! Labs are fun and informative, but write-ups are a pain.  He has past tests available for you to work on, but it's a tossup on whether or not they'll be anything like the real thing. No HW, no quizzes.  Overall I liked the class, tests and final were just difficult.

Very through professor who will make sure his students understand what he is teaching. A little late for every class but makes up for it with his informative lectures. Learned lots from his class. Grades very fair too.
Great Professor.  Always willing to help. Tests are fair.  He will throw in small details to separate the A's from the rest.  Best Homework and Lab policies on campus.
He is very smart, but loves to talk! Explains everything very thoroughly and is very willing to help outside of class.

Great Professor. Explains the material well and is helpful. I made a 'C' in Fundamentals but that is only because I slacked off and did not study for the tests. P.S. - Tests are fair, you just have to study.
Loves to talk.  He can talk for 4 hours on a single breath of air.  Loves to go into a lot of detail.  Gives you every chance to do well in the class.

The best teacher I have ever had. Just when you think you don't understand what the F he is talking about. He has managed to explain it 15 times before you can ask the question. If you can see the bigger picture then you will have no problem.  Just wait and everything that he say will make sense. He is a true authority on the subject matter.

very helpful and clear on his lectures. Not very organized in his work. will take a month before handing back your lab report critique. Which is very imp 2wards your next lab report. class is easy if you follow along with him and take notes, which are easy to follow and very clear. his practice tests are also very helpful. they usually save u.
I learned alot from the lectures and never really used the textbook. Very helpful guy. Not an easy "A" but pay attention and do the practice exams and you should do good in his classes.
Test are hard if you dont study.  He gave you many sample test which is very helpful because his test is 95% just like his sample test.  He grade hard!  Very helpful if you need his help.
Good Guy, He is a little picky, but not too bad.  He also can tell some interesting stories.  He is very willing to help outside of class.
No Comments
He has an annoying cough.
No Comments
